title: sirikkattAn vENDum
sahitya:
sirikkattAn vENDum ammA manak-kurangin cETTaiyaip-pArttu cummA


anupallavi

  erikkum kAma krOdham dharikkum nATakak-kATSi arikkum vanja valaiyai arutterivadE mATSi


caraNam    kETTuk-kETTp-puLitta kizhaTTup-pazham kathaiyE kiLarcciyellAm AnkAra vaLarcci tarum udaiyE
ATTuk-kuTTikku nari ariya tuNaiyAghumO abattak-kaLanjiyan pEr ariccandiran AghumO
